item.title: My Favorite Swift/iOS/MacOS Resources
item.description: RESOURCES Originally written for the #swift-dev branch of PittCSC iOS/MacOS Application Development & Swift Name Topics Post Frequency Reading-level Swift by Sundell Articles, Tutorials, Swift Frequent Beginner-Advanced UseYourLoaf Debugging, testing, assorted Weekly Intermediate-Advanced HackingWithSwift Tutorials, career Occasional Beginner TheSwiftDev Tutorials, Vapor, SPM, design patterns, assorted Every other week Intermediate - Advanced SwiftRocks Deployment, security, internals Monthly… sometimes Advanced RDerik Security, environment Monthly… sometimes Advanced Donny Wals Data, JSON, Combine Every other week Intermediate - Advanced Dave DeLong HTTP with Swift, compiler Monthly… sometimes Beginner - Advanced TheAtomicBirdhouse Assorted, CloudKit Monthly… sometimes Intermediate - Advanced iOSGoodies Newsletter, shoutouts Weekly Beginner - Advanced AndyIbanez Assorted Weekly Beginner - Advanced DanielSaidi SPM Monthly… sometimes Beginner - Advanced RayWenderlich Tutorials Weekly Beginner - Advanced Swiftjectivec Tutorials Frequent Beginner-Advanced Erica Sadun Assorted Occasional Intermediate-Advanced Igor Kulman Tutorials Monthly Intermediate-Advanced SarunW Tutorials Almost daily Beginner-Advanced Belkadan Software Articles, Low-Level, Swift Monthly Beginner-Advanced iOS/MacOS Security Name Topics Post Frequency Reading-level Objective-See Malware, Privacy, Security Frequent Intermediate-Advanced Sneak Privacy, Philosophy Occasional Beginner-Advanced Security Affairs - Mobile News Very Frequent Beginner-Advanced TheEvilBit Malware, Vulnerabilities Monthly Intermediate-Advanced The Desolation of Blog Guides, Opinions/Commentary, Privacy Frequent Beginner-Advanced Wojciech Reguła Securty, #macOSRedTeamingTricks, Vulnerabilities Frequent Beginner-Advanced Der Flounder Securty Seldom updated Intermediate-Advanced Open source directory: https://iosdevdirectory.
